javadoc:
The Ghidra application layout defines the customizable elements of the Ghidra
 application's directory structure.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new Ghidra application layout object.

throws.comment:
if there was a problem getting a user
             directory.

if there was a problem getting the application
             properties or modules.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructs a new Ghidra application layout object using a provided
 application installation directory instead of this layout's default.
 
 This is used when something external to Ghidra needs Ghidra's layout
 (like the Eclipse GhidraDevPlugin).

throws.comment:
if there was a problem getting a user
             directory.

if there was a problem getting the application
             properties.

methods.javadoc:
Finds the application root directories for this application layout.
@return A collection of the application root directories for this layout.
methods.name: findGhidraApplicationRootDirs
methods.comment: Finds the application root directories for this application layout.

return.comment: A collection of the application root directories for this layout.

methods.javadoc:
Finds the application installation directory for this Ghidra application
 layout.
@return The application installation directory for this Ghidra
         application layout. Could be null if there is no application
         installation directory.
methods.name: findGhidraApplicationInstallationDir
methods.comment:
Finds the application installation directory for this Ghidra application
 layout.

return.comment:
The application installation directory for this Ghidra
         application layout. Could be null if there is no application
         installation directory.

methods.name: findGhidraModules
methods.comment: Finds the modules for this Ghidra application layout.

throws.comment: if there was a problem finding the modules on disk.

return.comment: The modules for this Ghidra application layout.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the directory where all Ghidra extension archives are stored. This should be at the following location:
  • [application root]/Extensions/Ghidra
@return the archive folder, or null if can't be determined
methods.name: findExtensionArchiveDirectory
methods.comment:
Returns the directory where all Ghidra extension archives are stored.
 This should be at the following location:
 
 [application root]/Extensions/Ghidra

return.comment: the archive folder, or null if can't be determined

methods.javadoc:
Returns the directory where all Ghidra extension archives should be installed. This should be at the following location:
  • [application install dir]/Ghidra/Extensions
  • ghidra/Ghidra/Extensions (development mode)
@return the install folder, or null if can't be determined
methods.name: findExtensionInstallationDirectory
methods.comment:
Returns the directory where all Ghidra extension archives should be
 installed. This should be at the following location:
 
 [application install dir]/Ghidra/Extensions
 ghidra/Ghidra/Extensions (development mode)

return.comment: the install folder, or null if can't be determined

name: GhidraApplicationLayout
comment:
The Ghidra application layout defines the customizable elements of the Ghidra
 application's directory structure.
